name: Secondary Payload
effect: 1/Round, on a hit you may expend a charge as a free action to activate its detonator and deal 1d3 Explosive Damage in a Blast 1 Radius zone centered on one target. Then, create two pieces of Size 1 Hard Cover or 1 piece of Size 2 Hard Cover in a free, adjacent space to the Blast 1 Radius. This cover has an evasion of 5 and 10HP per Size.
description: Known to make use of every last piece of available equipment, Rubblefolk are known to fire munitions inside a modified casing meant to separate from the main projectile mid-flight, increasing the blunt force of the impact.

actions.name: Detonate Secondary Payload
actions.detail: Activate the Secondary Payload detonator and deal 1d3 Explosive Damage in a Blast 1 Radius zone centered on one target. Then, create two pieces of Size 1 Hard Cover or 1 piece of Size 2 Hard Cover in a free, adjacent space to the Blast 1 Radius.
